opp1.title: Opportunities
opp1.description: Find opportunities to volunteer in key events and be heard.

opp2.title: Fellowships
opp2.description: Join our fellowship program and be part of a great team that will help you achieve your goals.

opp3.title: Webinars
opp3.description: Attend different webinars regarding topics like environmental and political issues.

opp4.title: Community
opp4.description: Be a part of an amazing community that is always there for you to help you achieve your goals.
